channel.title: amorous.me
channel.description: Use artificial intelligence to spark amorous ideas for you and your loved ones

item.title: Sensual stories: Generate naughty stories that inspire your love life.
item.dc:creator: Sebastian
item.description: A whole essay will about your love, you, and some of the most romantic, naughty, and craziest things you can dream of will be written by an AI. Be excited!

item.title: AI Poems: Generate romantic essays for you loved ones.
item.dc:creator: Sebastian
item.description: Trained by the comprehensive body of 500 poems by the grandmasters of all times this neural net will produce fine input for you and your loved ones. Just try it like: “Eva loves to”

item.title: Essays: Generate dedicated poems for the one person!
item.dc:creator: Sebastian
item.description: Trained by more than 250.000 lines of romance, you can write an essay about you and your loved ones. Right here, right now. Just insert your fantasies. Start with wordss like like: “One day Rosie and I”

item.title: Romantic texts and HuggingFace.
item.dc:creator: Sebastian
item.description:
Generate naughty stories that will inspire your love life.

HuggingFace

AI
